last_phrase: In conclusion, while spiritualism and materialism offer different perspectives on reality, the study of human magnetism belongs in the hospitable realm of science. Although some may be misguided in their pursuits, the pursuit of knowledge has led to great scientific advancements and discoveries. Let us not allow the deceitful actions of a few detract from the potential good that can be achieved through the honest examination of human magnetism.
